name: Super Mango 64 (TeamMango)
description:
Super Mango 64 is a retro-inspired 3D platformer where you jump, collect bananas, and throw barrels! Play as Mango the Monkey to make it to the end of the level to collect the illusive Golden Banana.

Alex Hartman - Lead 3D Artist/Animator

Alex Dimitrijevic - Lead Programmer/2D Art

Mitchell Ahrens - Gameplay Designer/Art

Marcos Sanchez - AI/Level Designer

Brooklyn DiPietrantonio - Level Designer

Will Bacchus - Music/Sound Designer
